pullrequest.title: Fix race conditions in Master::ProcessMessage and Publisher::OnPublishComplete

content.raw:
we got a report that gzserver crashes with the same backtrace when objects are deleted. 

I have been testing this branch but I was still seeing the crash. I added a simple check in [master\_ProcessMessage\_race\_ian](#!/osrf/gazebo/branch/master_ProcessMessage_race_ian?dest=master_ProcessMessage_race#diff) branch which seems to help and I have not been able to reproduce the crash now \(or maybe it’s just harder to reproduce\). 

I have a script and a test world to help me reproduce the crash [here](https://bitbucket.org/snippets/iche033/Ke6og7).  

1. launch boxes.world. Note that gzclient must be started. Having gzserver alone does not cause the crash for me

    1. `gazebo --verbose boxes.world`
    
2. Run delete.sh to delete models in the world

    1. `sh delete.sh`
content.html:
we got a report that gzserver crashes with the same backtrace when objects are deleted.

I have been testing this branch but I was still seeing the crash. I added a simple check in master_ProcessMessage_race_ian branch which seems to help and I have not been able to reproduce the crash now (or maybe it’s just harder to reproduce).

I have a script and a test world to help me reproduce the crash here.

  1. launch boxes.world. Note that gzclient must be started. Having gzserver alone does not cause the crash for me

    1. gazebo --verbose boxes.world

  2. Run delete.sh to delete models in the world

    1. sh delete.sh
